price: Jaannii immoo boba’aa ibiddaa kan aara hin qabne irraa uume.
arabic: وَخَلَقَ ٱلۡجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٖ مِّن نَّارٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wakhalaqa al-jāna min mārijin min nārin
